title: Looking for a friendly, awsome adc that can skype (ill support) (ranked)
body:
im looking for a nice person to play with on friday-sunday nights 
who can skype with me and climb the gold with me
leave your comments  bellow

mains -
fav supports - 
time available to play -

replies.body:
Hi, I'm a bronze 3 ADC/ supp main also looking for a duo partner :D. 
I main graves and tristana in the ADC role
Favourite supports have got to be tahm khench and nautlis but I really don't mind
Can play whenever really, just not Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights due to work and going out with mates.

Thanks for your time ^_^
-Traloop
